column4: Is anyone here any good with shell scripting with things such as tracert that can help/advise me on something
i need to test loading times of my website on different servers, i was hoping that this could be automated in some sort of shell script is this possible?
if you mean response times, yes, you just need to measure the elasped time with shell scripting and some HTTP get tool, like wget
how would i do that with wget (where can i get it from?)
